abstract.p: Photos of clam digger pants seen On the Street in New York

block.p: During most of the last century, fashion was preoccupied with the ups and downs of skirt hems. Today, its focus is on the length of pants. This spring's revival of the high-water-length clam digger appears to offer an alternative to the post-World War II capri-style pants so popular last year -- a narrow, leg-shaping cut with a hem anywhere from the top of the calf to above the ankle (bottom, second from left). The width of the leg differentiates the clam digger and the capri.

This spring's revival of the high-water-length clam digger appears to offer an alternative to the post-World War II capri-style pants so popular last year -- a narrow, leg-shaping cut with a hem anywhere from the top of the calf to above the ankle (bottom, second from left). The width of the leg differentiates the clam digger and the capri.
The surprise is the number of young men wearing the clam digger. The comfort factor continues to be the inspiration of American design.
